772270.name: Blocked and Loaded
772270.description:
You should be dead. The lone survivor of a horrific battle, you begin your journey struggling to retreat back to Hope City. It won't be long before you're back in the service of the king, fighting legions of unholy enemies for loot and glory. But mostly loot.

Choose from an assortment of 150 armaments as you team up with friends in this fast paced MMO-RPG-FPS.

Experiment with a creative leveling and loot system which allows for detailed customization of your stats.

Show off your own home to friends; complete with treasure chests, cooking pot, blacklisting anvil and farming area.

Drop in, drop out multiplayer makes joining games quick and easy without any thought on your part.

Explore a large, open world spanning snow wastelands to dangerous caverns.

Trade items with players for what you need to complete your build out.
